The CrewOne

Introduction

Siwoo, formerly known as JM, is a South Korean singer under Bluedot Entertainment.

On June 30, 2021, he debuted as a member of the boy group JUST B with the mini album "Just Burn". Prior to debuting, Siwoo was known for appearing on the survival show "I-LAND" under his birth name Chu Ji-min.

On July 16, 2024, it was announced that Siwoo, then known as JM, legally changed his name to Chu Si-woo. Therefore, he would go by the stage name Siwoo from now on.

On July 20, 2024, Bluedot Entertainment announced that Siwoo's activities would be suspended for an indefinite period due to recent events. Therefore, he will not be included in any of The CrewOne or JUST B activities for the time being.

On November 29, 2024, Blue Dot announced that Just B would be separating from The CrewOne and would go back to promoting as 6 members, signaling that Siwoo is back from hiatus.
